***ADD CLEAR RAM BEFORE MVR - fixed
***CHANGE BOOLEAN ENABLE TO CONNECT TO BOOLEAN RSNOR LATCHES - fixed
***FIX COMPARE/XOR/JUMPIF MECHANISM - fixed
***REPAIR FLAGS - fixed
***CHANGE MVD TO PUT 0010 NOT 0001 - fixed
***FIX USELESS SUBTRACTION AT BEGINNING
***REPLACE LDA 00000000 with CLR


/------------------------\
|MULTIPLY NONZERO NUMBERS|
\------------------------/

RAM USAGE:
-R15 stores second number(how many loops)
-R14 stores increment of completed loops
-R10 stores the constant 1
-R02 stores current total
-R01 stores first number


PROGRAM FLOW:

BEGIN:
1->R10
N1->R01
N2->R15
0->R14
0->R02
R15-R10->R15
LOOP:
CLEAR EF
if R14=R15(EF), goto END
else:
R01+R02->R02
R14+R10->R14
goto LOOP
END:
R01->DISPLAY
EXIT


ASSEMBLY:

00001 LDA 1010 00000001
00010 LDA 0001 NUM1
00011 LDA 1111 NUM2
00100 LDA 1110 00000000
00101 LDA 0010 00000000
00110 MVA 1111 00000000
00111 MVB 1010 00000000
01000 ALU 0010 00000000
01001 CLR 1111 00000000
01010 MVR 1111 00000000
----------LOOP---------
01011 NOP 1111 00000000
01100 MVA 1111 00000000
01101 MVB 1110 00000000
01110 CLF 0001 00000000
01111 ALU 0110 00000000
10000 JMF 0001 00011101
10001 MVA 0001 00000000
10010 MVB 0010 00000000
10011 ALU 0001 00000000
10100 CLR 0010 00000000
10101 MVR 0010 00000000
10110 MVA 1110 00000000
10111 MVB 1010 00000000
11000 ALU 0001 00000000
11001 CLR 1110 00000000
11010 MVR 1110 00000000
11011 JMP 0000 00001011
----------END----------
11101 NOP 0010 00000000
11110 MVD 0010 00000000
11111 HAL 0000 00000000

MACHINE:

00001 0001 1010 00000001
00010 0001 0001 NUM1
00011 0001 1111 NUM2
00100 0001 1110 00000000
00101 0001 0010 00000000
00110 1001 1111 00000000
00111 1010 1010 00000000
01000 0010 0010 00000000
01001 1100 1111 00000000
01010 1011 1111 00000000
----------LOOP---------
01011 0000 1111 00000000
01100 1001 1111 00000000
01101 1010 1110 00000000
01110 1000 0001 00000000
01111 0010 0110 00000000
10000 1101 0001 00011101
10001 1001 0001 00000000
10010 1010 0010 00000000
10011 0010 0001 00000000
10100 1100 0010 00000000
10101 1011 0010 00000000
10110 1001 1110 00000000
10111 1010 1010 00000000
11000 0010 0001 00000000
11001 1100 1110 00000000
11010 1011 1110 00000000
11011 0100 0000 00001011
----------END----------
11101 0000 0010 00000000
11110 0011 0010 00000000
11111 1111 0000 00000000
